# Mistral

Use `mistral/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "mistral-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "mistral/codestral-latest",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `MISTRAL_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/mistral`

## Default base URL

Not listed.

You can override the base URL by setting `MISTRAL_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://docs.mistral.ai/getting-started/models/
